authentication.deviceTimeError: You cannot log in because the clock on your device is more than 5 minutes wrong. Adjust your clock and try again.
authentication.permissionRequestDenied: You must accept the requested rights to use this service. Please try to log in again.

interruptDialog.titleText: You are about to exit the form
interruptDialog.bodyText: The form contains unsaved data. Do you want to continue entering data or exit, in which case the data you entered will be deleted?

deleteDialog.titleText: Are you sure you want to delete the project?
deleteDialog.bodyText: Deleting the project is a permanent action and the project data cannot be restored after deletion.

validations.stringMin: The field length must be at least {{min}} characters
validations.stringMax: The field length must not exceed {{max}} characters

form.requiredInstruction: EN:Kaikki tähdellä * merkityt kentät ovat pakollisia.

yhteystiedot.instructions: EN:Hankkeelle lisättävät tahot saavat sähköpostiinsa linkin, jonka kautta he pystyvät liittymään hankkeeseeen Haitattomassa. Tämän jälkeen he pystyvät tarkastelemaan hanketta ja luomaan hankkeelle hakemuksia.

meta.title: Haitaton - Create a new cable report application

suunnitteluVaihe.KATUSUUNNITTELU_TAI_ALUEVARAUS: Street planning or planning of area reservations
suunnitteluVaihe.TYOMAAN_TAI_HANKKEEN_AIKAINEN: Early planning of a worksite or project

tyomaaKoko.SUPPEA_TAI_PISTE: Single, narrow location and/or point-like location
tyomaaKoko.YLI_10M_TAI_KORTTELI: Worksite length of more than 10 m and/or worksite the length of an entire block
tyomaaKoko.LAAJA_TAI_USEA_KORTTELI: Worksite extends to covering different sides of the street and/or is several blocks long

kaistaHaitta.KAKSI: Reduces one lane in one direction
kaistaHaitta.KOLME: Simultaneously reduces lanes in two directions
kaistaHaitta.NELJA: Simultaneously reduces several lanes in two directions
kaistaHaitta.VIISI: Simultaneously reduces several lanes in different directions of a junction

editingDisabled.STARTED: Information on the ongoing project cannot be edited.

hankeForm.savingSuccessText: The draft has been saved in the project list
hankeForm.savingFailText: Could not save the draft, try again

labels.onYKTHanke: The project is a Shared Public Utility Site (YKT) project

toolTips.perustiedot: Mandatory basic information about the project must be filled in. If all the mandatory information is not filled in, the new project will be saved in Haitaton but will not be able to proceed to the impact assessment. You can continue to fill in information on the project later by opening it via the project list
toolTips.nimi: Name that concisely describes the project
toolTips.onYKTHanke: Joint municipal worksite – a joint project under the cooperation agreement. In addition to the City of Helsinki’s Urban Environment Division, the parties are Helsinki City Transport (HKL), Helsinki Region Environmental Services (HSY), Helen Ltd, Helen Electricity Network Ltd, Auris Kaasunjakelu Ltd and the communications network operators Cinia Ltd, DNA Plc, Elisa Plc and Telia Finland Plc. The aim of the Shared Public Utility Site (YKT) partnership is to streamline the construction of public spaces in the city and adapt the contracting parties’ individual projects into jointly implemented projects that improve the quality and supply of infrastructure services.
toolTips.alkuPvm: Start date of project implementation (Note! Implementation in a public area, not, for example, on a plot)
toolTips.loppuPvm: End date of project implementation (Note! Implementation in a public area, not, for example, on the side of a plot)
toolTips.vaihe: A description of the progress of the project which will be updated as the project progresses. The programming phase is the initial project planning or pre-planning phase. The planning phase has subphases depending on the level of detail of the planning. In terms of the permit application process, the project is in the planning phase until it receives an execution permit from the city. At the construction phase, the project has received a permit from the city. Haitaton does not cover the permit application, construction or completion/maintenance/handover phases of the project.
toolTips.kuvaus: Description of the main content and objectives of the project. (Note! Implementation in a public area, not, for example, on the side of a plot)
toolTips.suunnitteluVaihe: A subphase refining the planning phase, which will be updated as the project progresses.
toolTips.omistajat: The project owner is responsible for the entire project from its beginning to its end/completion/handover.
toolTips.arvioijat: The project analyst or assessor may be the project owner or another party authorised by the owner (for example, a project planning consultant or contractor not affiliated with the owner).
toolTips.toteuttajat: The person responsible for implementing the project may be the project owner or another party authorised by the owner (for example, a contractor not affiliated with the owner).
toolTips.tyomaaKatuosoite: The street address(es) of the project and the number or range of numbers (e.g. Mannerheimintie 5, Hämeentie 3–27) or other locating information if the street address is not available.
toolTips.tyomaaTyyppi: Multiple selection of project type. A project can consist of several different project types, which means you can select several project types.
toolTips.kaistaHaitta: Likely nuisance to lane arrangements on the main carriageways

perustiedotForm.instructions: <1>EN:Hankkeen luonnin kautta pääset lähettämään myös hakemuksia.</1><1><0>HUOM!</0> Mikäli teet pelkkää johtoselvitystä yksityiselle alueelle, <3>täytä hakemus</3>. Yleisten alueiden johtoselvitykset haetaan hankkeen luonnin jälkeen kaivuilmoituksen kautta.</1><1>Lisäämällä hankkeen tiedot, pystyt kopioimaan ne lopuksi tarvitsemiisi hakemuksiin.</1>

hankkeenAlueForm.instructions: Several geometries can be drawn for the project. Geometry areas affect the project’s traffic congestion indices. Drawing tools can be found at the bottom left of the map view. With the pen tool, you can draw polygonal geometries by clicking the point where you want an angle. With the square tool, you can create square areas by first clicking the map and moving the mouse in the direction you want. Clicking it again “closes” the square drawing. A geometry can be edited by “grabbing” the edge of the geometry and dragging. A square geometry can also be shaped by grabbing the edge. lete a geometry, first select the geometry by clicking it; a bin icon will appear in the bottom left drawing tools which you can click to delete the geometry.
hankkeenAlueForm.haitatInstructions: EN:Anna arvio suurimmista mahdollisista vaikutuksista hankealueella.

hankkeenYhteenvetoForm.instructions: EN:Tarkista antamasi tiedot ja tallenna hanke tai tallenna ja siirry lisäämään hakemuksia.

finishedForm.header: The form has been successfully submitted

perustiedot.instructions: EN:<0>Huomioithan, että johtoselvitys on voimassa 1 kuukauden. Johtoselvityksen tulee olla voimassa johtojen maastonäyttöjä tilattaessa sekä Johtoselvitysta tehdessä. Johtoselvitys on tarvittaessa päivitettävä.</0><0>Yleisellä alueella tehtävästä työstä on tehtävä erillinen ilmoitus kaupungille. Mikäli joudut rajoittamaan liikennettä esimerkiksi työkoneiden kuljetuksen vuoksi tai poistamaan pysäköintipaikkoja kadun varresta, tulee sinun tehdä myös aluevuokraushakemus liikennejärjestelysuunnitelmineen.</0>

alueet.instructions: EN:Voit lisätä selvitettävän alueen piirtämällä sen kartalle. Voit lisätä samalle hakemukselle useampia alueita, mikäli niitä koskeva aikaväli on sama.
alueet.giveDates: EN:Valitse työn päivämäärät piirtääksesi selvitettävät alueet kartalle.

labels.emergencyWork: EN:Kaivutyö on aloitettu ennen johtoselvityksen tilaamista merkittävien vahinkojen välttämiseksi

hakemus.applicationTypeInstruction: EN:Valitse hakemustyyppi. Osaan hakemuksista voit myös kopioida aiemman hakemuksen pohjaksi. Kaivuilmoituksen kautta pääset tekemään myös johtoselvityksen, mikäli sinulla ei sellaista vielä ole.

hankeIndexes.haittaindexTooltip: Nuisance indices are calculated by project area. The indices are updated when you save the form or go to the next page.
hankeIndexes.indexesNotCalculated: No nuisance indices have been calculated.

homepage.pageSubTitle_loggedIn: Service for the promotion of projects and management of nuisances in public areas
homepage.pageSubTitle: Service for monitoring projects and their negative impacts in public areas
homepage.info: In the Haitaton service, you can learn about and give feedback on all ongoing and upcoming projects in public areas. You can view projects on a map or in a list. Are you starting a project or submitting applications?

hanke.title: Create a new project
hanke.description: By creating a Haitaton project, you can plan work in the public domain in advance and make applications such as cabling surveys.

hakemus.title: Application/Working phase
hakemus.description: The applications are for excavation or land lease notices or temporary traffic arrangements.

johtotietoselvitys.title: Cable report
johtotietoselvitys.description: A request for clarification on cable location information for a specific area. Required as an attachment to the excavation notice.

valmistelu.title: Project in the preparatory phase
valmistelu.description: A project for long-term review and planning that does not consist of applications.

hankesalkku.title: Own projects
hankesalkku.description: In your own projects, you will find the projects and applications that you have previously created.

hankelista.title: Project list
hankelista.description: View a list of ongoing and upcoming projects.

kartta.title: View the projects
kartta.description: View a map or a list of ongoing and upcoming projects in public areas.

kartta_kirjautumaton.title: Projects on a map
kartta_kirjautumaton.description: View current and future projects on a map

tietoja_haitattomasta.title: About Haitaton
tietoja_haitattomasta.description: Here, you can find more detailed information on the notification process as well as on the different functionalities of Haitaton.

ohjeet.title: Instructions
ohjeet.description: See the guidelines for projects in public areas.
